value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Discover how to create a Docker image and store it in the Azure Container Registry, then use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the image.

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
value.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Explore concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore concepts of data analytics

value.title: Implement Azure VM-based SAP solutions
value.excerpt: Implement Azure VM-based SAP solutions

value.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
value.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Introduction to Python
value.excerpt: Learn about the Python programming language, how to execute statements and scripts, declare variables, and create a basic Python app.

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

value.title: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure

value.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
value.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 overview | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: James Baker joins Lara Rubbelke to introduce Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2, which is redefining cloud storage for big data analytics due to multi-modal (object store and file system) access and combining the best qualities of a dedicated analytics file system with those of a cloud-scale object store.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/McJj_N-pjgI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Full-stack end-to-end monitoring with Azure Monitor | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Rahul Bagaria joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss Azure Monitor, which now includes Log Analytics and Application Insights. Azure Monitor provides full stack monitoring tools for collecting and analyzing telemetry that allow you to maximize the performance and availability of your cloud and on-premises resources
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B5X7M0WlOtY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to host a static website with Azure Storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how you can host a static website running in Azure Storage in a few steps.     For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure:

value.title: How to publish your APIs with the new developer portal in Azure API Management | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: The all-new API Management developer portal lets you effortlessly publish your APIs. It's customizable, lightweight, and intuitive. Mike Budzynski joins Scott Hanselman to show how to publish your APIs with the new developer portal in Azure API Management.  3:30 - Demo  Azure API Management resources

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7pmn6luCwQ4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WElUQm02BTU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Jupyter Notebooks in Azure Data Studio | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Vicky Harp joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Data Studio combined the simple and robust SQL query editing experience of tools like SSMS with the flexibility and collaboration of Jupyter Notebooks. The November 2019 release of Azure Data Studio included SQL Server 2019 Guide as a Jupyter Book, which
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pHuRj9ty9cI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Planning Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to learn about how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will give you the Azure knowledge around the reference architecture for SAP Workloads, how to plan for the implementation of SAP solutions on Azure, and the preparation for your migration of SAP workloads to Azure.

topItems.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

topItems.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

topItems.title: Prepare to migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module provides details on the important steps prior to deploying SAP workloads to Azure: project preparation and planning, pilot, non-production, production preparation, go live, and post production.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
value.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: Azure provides a scalable, compliant, and enterprise-proven platform for a range of SAP workloads. In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP before deploying SAP solutions in Azure, and look at the different options for deploying SAP in Azure.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.
